summary: I PURCHASED THIS VEHICLE IN 2016 WITH A OPEN RECALL, THE DEALERSHIP FAILED TO INFORM ME ABOUT OR FIX PRIOR TO SELLING IT. THE VEHICLE HAS HAD SEVERAL PROBLEMS THEY REFUSED TO REPAIR EVEN THOUGH I PURCHASED IT FROM THEM. THEY ARE A GM DEALERSHIP SAID THEY DO NOT HAVE THE TOOLS TO MAKE ANY REPAIRS ON THE VEHICLE. THIS INCIDENT IN QUESTION HAPPENED ON 11-04-17 THE CAR WAS SITTING IN MY DRIVEWAY AND I NOTICED A PUDDLE OF GAS UNDER THE CAR, THE GAS TANK IS WHAT WAS LEAKING AND THERE HAS BEEN A OPEN RECALL ON IT SINCE 2014.
